about_the_game:
Vasrak Kingdom: Battle on the Frontier

A delightful strategy game led by hamster general Zowlber! Win real-time battles that combine deck-building and Tic-Tac-Toe, and protect the kingdom’s precious resources.

Overview

The endless food war between the Vasrak Kingdom and the Pudduck Kingdom. Hamster General Zowlber must command human soldiers at the frontier to fend off enemy invasions. Enjoy the fun of real-time strategy and deck-building with charming characters and fast-paced battles.

Features

  • A unique blend of deck-building and Tic-Tac-Toe: Deploy soldiers to control the battlefield. Complete a line to deal massive damage to your opponent.

  • Real-time strategic battles: Collect mana to summon soldiers and respond quickly to enemy actions.

  • Various soldier cards and abilities: Use the warrior's powerful combat skills, the archer’s blitz attack, and the farmer’s mana recovery effect to outsmart your opponent.

  • Rewards from battles: Earn money from victories and enhance your deck with new cards from the shop.

Story

Zowlber, a talented general of the Vasrak Kingdom, is unexpectedly demoted to the frontier. Planning to relax and groom his fur, he soon finds himself caught in the midst of a battle with the Pudduck Kingdom, a long-time rival. As winter approaches and food supplies dwindle, Zowlber, alongside his lieutenant squirrel Hoedue, must lead human soldiers to protect the kingdom's precious sunflower seeds.

Gameplay

  • Strategic battles on a 3x3 battlefield: Use Tic-Tac-Toe rules to complete lines and control the board.

  • Mana system: Mana automatically regenerates over time and is used to summon soldiers.

  • Capture and combat mechanics: Unlike classic Tic-Tac-Toe, already occupied spaces can be fought over and reclaimed through combat.

  • Deck-building fun: Collect various soldier cards and strengthen your deck by purchasing new cards from the shop.

Charming characters and fresh strategies await in Vasrak Kingdom: Battle on the Frontier!

Can you, as the commander, defend the kingdom against the Pudduck Kingdom’s invasion?
